content: Hi @ Bob Milius , when you have a chance, would you be willing to write the why we need the Consensus Sequence Block and HLA Results profiles in their respective Wiki pages? Thanks a lot!
@Gaston Fiore I'll do it today.
Thank you very much indeed! We can work on their new structure after the ballot maybe?

Good morning @ Bob Milius , Gil keeps asking about the why information for the Consensus Sequence Block and HLA Results profiles. Could you write something even if very short when you find the time? Thank you very much indeed!
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=SequenceConsensusSequenceBlock_FHIR_Profile_Proposal
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=DiagnosticReportHlaResults_FHIR_Profile_Proposal
Hi @Gaston Fiore I just updated them. Let me know if you need anything else.
Thank you so much Bob! I look forward to working on HLA soon.
